categories: Category:Battles of the invasion of the Tython system

nodes.text: During the Infinite Empire of the Rakata species invaded the Tython system, the Infinite Empire captured the gas giant Mawr and its numerous moons, which were some of the Settled Worlds of the system. The battle, which occurred between 25,793–25,792 BBY, followed an attack on the space station Fury Station, and the Empire also captured the gas giant Obri around the same time. From there, the Rakata struck at the planet Tython.
Mawr's capture was first mentioned in the comic book Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 1, a comic book written by John Ostrander and released on November 20, 2013.
